name: Geoland
description:
Geoland is a simple like real-time 3D strategy game for Windows & macOS. The design focus is more about user experience.  Compete with the foot, road, and air units on the grid. From 1v1s to 200vs200 battles. Use units like tanks and snipers to engage in a large scale war. 

Performance

From the ground up Geoland was built to run at max performance on a laptop with integrated graphics. 60+ FPS with an Intel i3. 

Development

Coming later this year you'll be able to play against friends and random people in an ELO based matchmaking system. Other exciting features are planned as well like Airports, HQ upgrades, varying terrain and so much more. 

Check out the Dev Vlogs - https://youtube.com/channel/UCw3KKDXgrU3WAAA_Gl_HWiw

Full release date - December 7, 2020.
